definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Pr 11:2 ignominy, dishonour;—abs. ´[[ק]]: Ho 4:7 +; cstr. [[קְלוֹן]] Is 22:18; sf. [[קְלוֹנֵח]] Je 13:26 +;—

of national ignominy Ho 4:7, Ho 4:18 (dub. Line, v. Che Now), Je 46:12 (rd. prob. [[קוֹלֵח]], so LXX Gie Co HPt), Hb Hab 2:16, Ps 83:17; of nation under fig. of woman, = pudenda, Je 13:26, Na 3:5 (‖[[מַעְרֵח ]]).

personal dishonour, disgrace, of Shebna, as disgrace to his lord’s house Is 22:18(opp. [[כְּבוֹדֶָךָ]]); individ., Job 10:25, Pr 3:35 (opp. [[כָּבוֹד]]), Pr 6:33, Pr 9:7, Pr 11:2, Pr 12:16, Pr 13:18 (opp. [[יְכֻבָָּד]]), Pr 18:3, Pr 22:10.
